name: Tang Kua vs Bacteria's
description:
Due to the increasing population of humans worldwide, a lot of turtles

 disappeared around the world. The remaining turtles decided to go

live on an island far away from humans and they destructive instinct.

For a while their new life seemed to be going well until an horrible

threat appeared on their island, almost all turtles were killed.

Now only four of them remains to protect a few eggs they could

save and put them somewhere safe. 

Tang Kua, the last alligator turtle alive had decided to fight against

their fate to save the future generations of turtles from extinction.

The future of their species depends on it.

      

- Play time is  about 1h20.

- One  optional boss battle.

       

- This game was made in 17 days .

        

"The Vilains" theme by Nid

"Demise" theme by Peritune

Other music by Youfulca

Title screen image by Alexanda

Enemies from Elv Games

Animations from Dreams Circle

(and a few from ManuGamingCreations)

Tilesets from Kokoro Reflections

Fish icons & other icons from PixelOdyssey
